tool.name: OGS: MergeMeshToBulkMesh
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'MergeMeshToBulkMesh'.
tool.command: if [ "$bulk_mesh_input_file" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$bulk_mesh_input_file.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$bulk_mesh_input_file' '${$bulk_mesh_input_file.element_identifier}'; fi; if [ "$mesh_input_file" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$mesh_input_file.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$mesh_input_file' '${$mesh_input_file.element_identifier}'; fi; MergeMeshToBulkMesh --bulk-mesh-input-file '$bulk_mesh_input_file.element_identifier' --mesh-input-file '$mesh_input_file.element_identifier' #if str($pressure).strip() != 'None' and str($pressure).strip() != '': --pressure '$pressure' #end if #if str($gas_pressure).strip() != 'None' and str($gas_pressure).strip() != '': --gas_pressure '$gas_pressure' #end if #if str($capillary_pressure).strip() != 'None' and str($capillary_pressure).strip() != '': --capillary_pressure '$capillary_pressure' #end if #if str($temperature).strip() != 'None' and str($temperature).strip() != '': --temperature '$temperature' #end if #if str($sigma_xx).strip() != 'None' and str($sigma_xx).strip() != '': --sigma_xx '$sigma_xx' #end if #if str($sigma_yy).strip() != 'None' and str($sigma_yy).strip() != '': --sigma_yy '$sigma_yy' #end if #if str($sigma_zz).strip() != 'None' and str($sigma_zz).strip() != '': --sigma_zz '$sigma_zz' #end if #if str($material_id).strip() != 'None' and str($material_id).strip() != '': --material_id '$material_id' #end if --mesh-output-file output_1.vtk

param.name: bulk_mesh_input_file
param.label: bulk mesh input file
param.help: Input (.vtk | .msh). the file containing the input bulk mesh

param.name: mesh_input_file
param.label: mesh input file
param.help: Input (.vtk | .msh). the file containing the input mesh to be merged

param.name: pressure
param.label: pressure
param.help: initial pressure value in the mesh to be merged

param.name: gas_pressure
param.label: gas pressure
param.help: initial gas pressure value in the mesh to be merged

param.name: capillary_pressure
param.label: capillary pressure
param.help: initial capillary pressure value in the mesh to be merged

param.name: temperature
param.label: temperature
param.help: initial temperature value in the mesh to be merged

param.name: sigma_xx
param.label: sigma xx
param.help: initial stress xx value in the mesh to be merged

param.name: sigma_yy
param.label: sigma yy
param.help: initial stress yy value in the mesh to be merged

param.name: sigma_zz
param.label: sigma zz
param.help: initial stress zz value in the mesh to be merged

param.name: material_id
param.label: material id
param.help: Material ID of the mesh to be merged, (min = 0)

tool.help: This tool runs the **MergeMeshToBulkMesh** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
